rules_text:
When Vengeful Owlbear enters, wound target creature. [i](Until the end of your next turn, if a wounded creature would be dealt damage, it’s dealt that much damage plus one instead.)[/i]
Whenever another wild creature you control dies, wound target creature that dealt damage to it this turn. [i](Bears, Birds, Cats, Rats, and Spiders are wild creatures.)[/i]
